THE LONDON COMMUNITY LAPTOP ORCHESTRA IS A COMMUNITY RUN LAPTOP ORCHESTRA FOR LONDON FRIENDS TO MAKE SOUNDS IN A VARIETY OF UNUSUAL PLACES. THE LCLO HOLDS A COMMUNITY ETHOS WHERE ANYONE CAN PARTICIPATE.

OUR POLITICS ARE EXPLICIT BECAUSE THEY NEED TO BE. SOUND ART SPACES CAN BE SEXIST, HOMOPHOBIC, RACIST AND FACIST. WE AIM TO BE ACTIVE IN BREAKING THOSE STEREOTYPES.

FOUNDED AND (CURRENTLY) RUN BY KAT MACDONALD.
